dc_title_s: A Plan of Bombay Harbour on the coast of Malabar
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:50,000] Nautical map of Mumbai harbour showing shoals, sands, rocks, with with place names, depth shown by soundings and relief show pictorially. Includes 4 views of coastal profiles. Includes detailed navigational notes and directions. Plate 24 from: The Oriental pilot, or, A select collection of charts and plans ... for the navigation of the country trade in the seas beyond the Cape of Good Hope. London : Printed and sold by R. Sayer & J. Bennett, 1778.|48 x 68 centimeters|Scale [1:50,000]|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dc_publisher_s: Printed for Robt. Sayer and Jno. Bennett, No. 53, Fleet Street ; London
